algorithm_technique: Greedy approach using a max-heap to select most profitable projects available.
problem_summary_simple: Maximize capital by completing at most k projects, given initial capital and project requirements.
problem_summary_technical: Greedy selection of projects using a max-heap for available profits and a sorted list for project availability based on capital.
key_insights: The core idea is to always pick the most profitable project that is currently affordable.
Sorting projects by capital requirement allows efficient identification of available projects.
A max-heap is crucial for quickly retrieving the highest profit among available projects.
